Body: I am using an Android One mobile phone. When I try to install apps via WiFi I get Error Code: 495, but, when I do the same via mobile data it's working fine.When  follow the procedure mentioned in What is error code 495 on Google Play and the YouTube app? I get a "Connection Time Out Error". If I try a second time I can see the "Installing..." indicator appear, but I don't see any downloading file information and finally I get the same Error Code: 495.What could be the problem? How to solve this issue?
Title: Google Play Error Code: 495 on Android One

history.Text: I am using Android One mobile phone. When i am trying to install mobile application via WiFi i get Error Code: 495 But, when i do the same via mobile data its working fine.What could be the problem? How to solve this issue?  --SJ
google play Error Code: 495 on Android One

I am using Android One mobile phone. When i am trying to install mobile application via WiFi i get Error Code: 495 But, when i do the same via mobile data its working fine.When i Follow the below quoted solution i get **Connection TimeOut Error**> Go to settings-apps-all-download manager and clear dataWhat could be the problem? How to solve this issue?  --SJ

I am using Android One mobile phone. When i am trying to install mobile application via WiFi i get Error Code: 495 But, when i do the same via mobile data its working fine.When i Follow the below quoted solution at first time i get **Connection TimeOut Error** and second time i can see the installing in progress on app store but i don't see any downloading file and finally it will return the same Error Code: 495> Go to settings-apps-all-download manager and clear dataWhat could be the problem? How to solve this issue?  --SJ

I am using Android One mobile phone. When i am trying to install mobile application via WiFi i get Error Code: 495 But, when i do the same via mobile data its working fine.When i Follow the below quoted solution at the first time i get **Connection TimeOut Error** and second time i can see the ***installing...*** on app store but i don't see any downloading file and finally i get the same Error Code: 495> Go to settings-apps-all-download manager and clear dataWhat could be the problem? How to solve this issue?  --SJ

I am using Android One mobile phone. When i am trying to install mobile application via WiFi i get Error Code: 495 But, when i do the same via mobile data its working fine.> Go to settings-apps-all-download manager and clear dataWhen i follow the above mentioned procedure at the first time i get **Connection TimeOut Error** and at the second time i can see the ***installing...*** on app store but i don't see any downloading file information and finally i get the same Error Code: 495.What could be the problem? How to solve this issue?  --SJ

I am using an Android One mobile phone. When I try to install apps via WiFi I get Error Code: 495, but, when I do the same via mobile data it's working fine.When  follow the procedure mentioned in http://android.stackexchange.com/questions/23055/what-is-error-code-495-on-google-play-and-the-youtube-app I get a "Connection Time Out Error". If I try a second time I can see the "Installing..." indicator appear, but I don't see any downloading file information and finally I get the same Error Code: 495.What could be the problem? How to solve this issue?
Google Play Error Code: 495 on Android One
